Name: [RECOMMENDED] All bosses buff (read description)
Description: Bosses (including Moragia, Sludge Like, Kohga 1 2 3 & his Construct) are all stronger and faster (except for Ganondorf), Dungeon bosses deal gloom damage. They also have restricted Perfect Dodge timings when applicable. DO NOT USE WITH ANY OTHER ALL BOSSES BUFF OPTION.
